Usage: <cmd> +/-<offset>
Use this feature to add/deduct hours on pretime you receive from the connected predb.
This is needed so that pretime is recogniced in the correct time zone.

Example:
<cmd> +3 --- add 3hours
<cmd> -2 --- remove 2hours
<cmd> 0 --- disabled/no offset

Use http://www.timeanddate.com and enter your city name. (eg. New York)
New York is current time zone offset: UTC/GMT -4 hours, set <cmd> -4
